sections.text:
17-131.Safety regulations.

A city of the second class shall have the power to prescribe the thickness, strength, and manner of constructing stone, brick, and other buildings and to prescribe and direct the number and construction of means of exit and entrance and the construction of fire escapes in such buildings.

SourceLaws 1881, c. 24, § 1, p. 196;R.S.1913, § 5025;C.S.1922, § 4194;C.S.1929, § 17-133;R.S.1943, § 17-131;Laws 2017, LB133, § 25.
